SEARCH
Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange

Class AbstractExchange

java.lang.Object
edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange.AbstractExchange
All Implemented Interfaces:
StockExchange, StockExchangeSpi, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestExchange
public class AbstractExchange extends Object implements StockExchangeSpi
A simple exchange implementation for test purposes. This implementation provides access to the order execution history so that this may be used for verification purposes during testing.
Author:
Russ Moul
